answers.answer: I'm 35 weeks and I'm also having a boy.. the pain you are feeling I am experiencing to.. unfortunantly there is nothing you cab do about the pain besides take tylonal or soak in a warm tub.. if of you want to induce labor I would suggest walking.. best remedy to start contractions.. if you lost your mucus plug thanit sshouldn't take long.
Me too i cant walk at all im so much pain my feet hurt like if someone hit them with a bat ..im 37&4days having a boy.  I so redy to have him...
Im 38wks and dealing with the samething. I would like to get out there and walk but its freezing out. Our pelvic is getting ready for a delivery

Thats crazy like even walking is beginning to hurt and my doctors act likem i. enjoying the uncomfortableness...lol but man i wish i could put a picture up to show you how big i am.... you guys would think im having twins and i have gestational diabetes if thats how you spell it.

question: I am 37weeks and 6 days...im having a boy and when i sit for not even ten to fifteen minutes and i get up i can barely walk or stand up...its getting to be really stressful and i broke down crying at my ob apountment. what do i do about this pain and push this labor thing faster... oh plus i lost that mucus plug....it even hurts getting checkes to see how far i dialate
title: advise please
